recipe.title: Blueberry Cinnamon Roll Bake Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 packages ; cinnamon roll, save the icing

steps.step: Pre-heat oven according to the cinnamon roll package instructions.
Cut cinnamon rolls into bite-size pieces and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon until well combined.
Place cut up cinnamon rolls into an 8" x 8" (20 cm x 20 cm) baking dish. Pour blueberries on top followed by the milk mixture.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until fully cooked. If the top is looking too brown, cover with foil for the remaining time.
Slice then garnish with icing and serve.

Cut cinnamon rolls into bite-size pieces and set aside.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, and cinnamon until well combined.
Place cut up cinnamon rolls into an 8" x 8" (20 cm x 20 cm) baking dish.
Pour blueberries on top followed by the milk mixture.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until fully cooked.
If the top is looking too brown, cover with foil for the remaining time.
Slice then garnish with icing and serve.
